title: i like thi...
description: i like this games simplicity and quick play, but i do find it doesnt appeal to people who do not enjoy deduction games and doesnt have enough depth for those who do. Still, a quick fun time that im never upset to bring out.

title: Best with ...
description: Best with 6, 7 playersRecommended with 4-10 players

title: Good game,...
description: Good game, and it's fast, interesting, roles flying claims a plenty, FUD galore.  Werewolf is of course still better, but that is plenty more involved and not as accessible, and requires more players.

title: Played wit...
description: Played with student advisory group in school; they really really like it and are always asking to play.

title: Make sure ...
description: Make sure the players don't sit on squeaky chairs when you play.  Loud mood music helps too!

title: Punched ev...
description: Punched everything, never played so like new.

title: Had a fun ...
description: Had a fun time playing this game but it is very group dependant.

title: The only p...
description: The only party game I truly like.

title: A wonderfu...
description: A wonderful hidden role party game. Just long enough to be meaty, and just quick enough to play multiple games. Plus, with so many roles, it can be changed up and around to remain fresh.

title: Seems like...
description: Seems like more of a timed logic puzzle than anything else, strangely enough. Not to my taste.

title: A quick fi...
description: A quick filler/opener that gives you a condensed version of Mafia/Werewolf. It's mostly just piecing together logically all the roles and can be pretty easy to figure out with a group of aware people but still can give players a chance to make that one clever move at the right moment to deceive people.

title: My first e...
description:
My first experience playing a social deduction game. The app was a really nice touch so that everybody could play with nobody having to be the moderator.

Not great if you're playing with people who haven't played the game before as they don't have the ability to lie about roles as they don't know what they do.

title: Wishlist C...
description:
Wishlist Comment:
Because sometimes I don't want to moderate.

Owned Comment:
Secret Santa 2015
Good for a smaller set of players, regular werewolf is still the game of choice for 11+ players

title: [b][size=1...
description: [b][size=12][BGCOLOR=#C0C0C0]Sleeved[/BGCOLOR][/size][/b]

title: Not the gr...
description: Not the greatest deduction game ever, but it's nice quick fun.

title: The app is...
description: The app is a must have in order to keep the play going.

title: To my surp...
description: To my surprise, I quite enjoyed the few plays I had. I would definitely like to play it with my friends to get a better feel of it.

title: No player ...
description:
No player elimination or moderator, but otherwise it's much like the Werewolf/Mafia games that you're probably aware of. Play with the app to ensure that you get through the roles in the right order.
My expectation is that using a lot of the roles will improve the game, having many villagers in the available roles will heavily limit the information that can be used to work out who is what.

Very dependant on who is playing, one of those in my normal group plays randomly regardless of what role he had.

title: Great grou...
description:
Great group game. It’s not too long. Which is a blessing and a curse. A good game to play that you don’t have to teach a lot of rules. 

April 2019
Free - Gift - Nelson

title: I apprecia...
description: I appreciate that it's quick, but not really our thing.

title: We played ...
description: We played this with 10 players and it entertained every one of them. That is saying A LOT about the game. I'd give this a 10 but I think the experience is too dependent on the group you play it with.

title: Played onc...
description: Played once.

title: I did not ...
description:
I did not expect the kids to enjoy this game as much as they do. They really like being sneaky. They specially like all of the different powers.

INCLUDED:
 One Night Ultimate Werewolf Daybreak
